response.overview: Margot is a documentary filmmaker looking to meet her long-lost mother and extended family in a secluded Amish community. She and her film crew soon realize the family that welcomes them into their home might be hiding a sinister secret.
response.title: Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin

titles.title: パラノーマル・アクティビティ 7
เรียลลิตี้ ขนหัวลุก: ข้างๆ
